title.rendered: Rob Shapland joins DirectorsTalk to discuss the launch of our new cyber security assessment tool, f:CEL

content.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1633525144078{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Join our Head of Innovation, Rob Shapland as he discusses the launch of our new cyber security assessment tool, f:CEL with DirectorsTalk.[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwdGl0bGUlM0QlMjJ2aW1lby1wbGF5ZXIlMjIlMjBzcmMlM0QlMjJodHRwcyUzQSUyRiUyRnBsYXllci52aW1lby5jb20lMkZ2aWRlbyUyRjYxOTAwNTU1NSUzRmglM0Q2MzQ4MTc0OTBhJTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjI2NDAlMjIlMjBoZWlnaHQlM0QlMjIzNjAlMjIlMjBmcmFtZWJvcmRlciUzRCUyMjAlMjIlMjBhbGxvd2Z1bGxzY3JlZW4lM0UlM0MlMkZpZnJhbWUlM0U=[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
